mapper.insert: INSERT INTO topup_history(user_id, money, discount, balance, time) VALUES (#{user_id},#{money},#{discount},#{balance},#{time})
INSERT INTO consume_history(user_id, money, discount, consumeType, type, contentId) VALUES (#{user_id},#{money},#{discount},#{consumeType},#{type},#{contentId})
mapper.select: select * from (select userId, username, total_top+total_con as total from (select id as userId, username, ifnull(total_con,0) as total_con from user left join (select user_id,sum(money) as total_con from consume_history group by user_id) t1 on user.id = t1.user_id) s1 left join (select id, ifnull(total_top,0) as total_top from user left join (select user_id,sum(money) as total_top from topup_history group by user_id) t2 on user.id = t2.user_id) s2 on s1.userId = s2.id) h where total > #{totalConsume} order by total desc
select id from consume_history where contentId=#{ticketId}
select ticket_id from consume_ticket where consume_id=#{consumeId}
